alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cumberland County through 700 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeside Village, or near Cartersville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cartersville, Lakeside Village, Whiteville, Ashby, Trenton Mills and Tamworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
